subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etym}}
{{liushu|p}} – a cooker for steaming food. The derivative {{och-l|甑}} refers to the original word.

subSections.title: Compounds
subSections.text: {{zh-der|fold=1|不曾|何曾|似曾相識|幾曾|得未曾有|也曾|未曾|曾幾何時|曾經|曾經滄海}}
